data.name: name
data.label: Title
data.placeholder: e.g. car location data for self-driving ML

data.name: description
data.label: Description
data.help: Add a thorough description and provide as much detail as possible.

data.name: files
data.label: File
data.help: Please enter the URL to your data set file and click "ADD FILE" to validate the data.

data.name: links
data.label: Sample file
data.help: Please enter the URL to a sample of your data set file and click "ADD FILE" to validate the data.

data.name: access
data.label: Access Type
data.help: Choose how you want your files to be accessible
data.disclaimer: Do not provide downloadable personal data without the consent.

data.name: providerUri
data.label: Custom Provider URL
data.help: Enter the URL for your custom provider or leave blank to use the default provider. [Learn more](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/provider/).

data.name: timeout
data.label: Timeout
data.help: Define how long buyers should be able to download the data set again after the initial purchase.

data.name: dataTokenOptions
data.label: Datatoken Name & Symbol
data.help: The datatoken for this data set will be created with this name & symbol.

data.name: termsAndConditions
data.label: Terms & Conditions
options: I agree to these Terms and Conditions
